snippet: Works by Sarah Michelson and Deborah Hay finished the “Some sweet day” dance series in an atrium at the Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews performances of dance pieces choreographed by Sarah Michelson and Deborah Hay as part of final installment of Museum of Modern Art's dance series Some Sweet Day.
lead_paragraph: Works by Sarah Michelson and Deborah Hay finished the “Some sweet day” dance series in an atrium at the Museum of Modern Art.

headline.seo: Sarah Michelson and Deborah Hay in MoMA Series
headline.main: Managing to Change the Mood in MoMA’s Atrium
headline.print_headline: Managing to Change the Mood in MoMA’s Atrium
